zh: COSCUP 十週年了！臺灣的開源社群不斷茁壯，也有越來越多不同背景的參與者跨入開源的領域，分享並交流彼此的理念和成果。最近的這兩年，開放精神更跨出了資訊領域，在社會的各處發揚體現。「開放文化」是我們為 COSCUP 2015 訂下的主軸，熱愛自由與開放的你，請和我們一起散播開源精神吧！
en: The most Open activity you've ever met! COSCUP, Taiwan's largest open source conference, is celebrating its tenth year. Whether you are an open source developer, devoted promoter, skilled user, or newcomer seeking your way through the FLOSS wonderland, you're all welcomed to join the largest open source annual conference in Taiwan.
